General.Name: Metalnrg PLC
General.Description: MetalNRG plc operates as a natural resource and energy investing company. The company explores for gold, iron ore, nickel, copper, cobalt, silver, and diamonds deposits. It holds interests in the Gold Ridge project covering an area of 932 hectares located in Arizona, the United States; the Lake Victoria Gold project located in Tanzania; and the Uranium project located in Kyrgyzstan. The company was formerly known as ZimNRG PLC and changed its name to MetalNRG plc in March 2016. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Ely Place, London, United Kingdom, EC1N 6RY
